item.title: Violet Evergarden Movie 2020 BD HEVC
item.description: JudulViolet Evergarden Movie Japanese劇場版 ヴァイオレット・エヴァーガーデン Score8.88 ProduserShochiku TipeMovie StatusFinished Airing Total Episode1 Durasi2 hr 20 min Tanggal RilisSep 18, 2020 StudioKyoto Animation GenreDrama, Fantasy, Slice of Life Several years have passed since the end of The Great War. As the radio tower in Leidenschaftlich continues to be built, telephones will soon become more relevant, leading to a decline in demand for "Auto Memory Dolls." Even so, Violet Evergarden continues to rise in fame after her constant success with writing letters.

item.title: Byousoku 5 Centimeter Dual Subs English & indonesia
item.description: JudulByousoku 5 Centimeter Japanese秒速５センチメートル Score7.65 ProduserUnknown TipeMovie StatusFinished Airing Total Episode3 Durasi22 min per ep Tanggal RilisMar 3, 2007 StudioCoMix Wave Films GenreDrama, Romance, Slice of Life What happens when two people love each other but just aren't meant to be together? Takaki Toono and Akari Shinohara are childhood friends, but circumstances beyond their control tear them apart. They promise to stay in contact, and although the progression of time widens the distance between them, the chain of memories remains ever-present.
